lots.chat_only_mixin:
The message only visible on Mixin Messenger.
{0}
lots.hello_desc: Pando Lots, a messaging platform for users to simply and instantly message each other. Before we start, here are some rules you should be aware of:
lots.hello_rules_1: Chat content will be publicly visible. Please do not share confidential information.
lots.hello_rules_2: Only the recent {0} messages are kept. You can join the corresponding Mixin community to stay in touch.
lots.hello_rules_3: This is a community for everyone. Please be kind.
